comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Chauncey Mitchell Depew (1834-1928), U.S. Senator from New York. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chauncey_Depew His (second) wife was the former May Palmer. See NYT of Oct 6, 1901 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10E11FF355D1A728... for the announcement of their engagement. The piece also mentions that Mme Von Andre is Miss Palmer's sister.
